modName: How to export nif file from 3ds Max - Skyrim
summary: How to export nif file from 3ds Max (Skyrim)
descriptionHtml:
This is my tutorial showing how to export nif file from 3dsMax (Skyrim).
It is about only meshes, not about animations.

Archive contains:
- guidebook in pdf file
- video tutorial in mkv file
- \"Test file.max\" (with textures) as file for testing - it\'s file before exporting
- \"Test file.nif\" as file for testing - it\'s exported model from \"Test file.max\" (before editing in NifSkope)

You may also watch my video tutorial on YouTube.

How to import nif file to 3dsMax - Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11642
How to prepare nif file to import into Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11793
How to make collision in nif file - Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11884
author: starjacker0
